      • iso14443aSelectTag

        public byte iso14443aSelectTag(byte[] uid)
                        throws STException
        Must return 0x20 as the select protocol for type 14443a return this code to identify tag type iso14443-4 = Type4A. Must be aligned with ST25SDK identifyType4Product 3: response 0x20 means tag compliant with iso14443-4 = Type4A
        Throws:
        STException
